(b) The facility-wide emission limitations in subdivision (a) of this section
represent the allowable mercury emissions for each MRP facility for the control
periods in 2010 through 2014. (1)

The sum of
mass mercury emissions (in lb) from each applicable existing MRP unit at a MRP
facility identified in Table 1 below shall not exceed the facility-wide mercury
emission limitation (in lb/year) set forth in Table 1 beginning in the MRP
control period of 2010 and continuing through 2014. (2)

Compliance with the facility-wide mercury
emission cap for each MRP control period will be based upon a 12-month total, rolled monthly, reported quarterly. (c) Forty pounds of mercury emissions are set
aside for new MRP units and existing MRP units not in Table 1 of this
section. Notes
